Issue.summary: Production-ready Docker images for the End User
Issue.description: prompt, ready to use his/her wallet to start running transactions. Similar to INDY-1794, it would be nice if I want to run a Node on the Sovrin network, I should be able to run: {quote}{{$ docker run -it hyperledger-indy/validator:mainnet}} {quote} Which should contain the build with the package levels required to comply/function on the Provisional network. It looks like maybe some work was started on this here: https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-node/blob/master/ci/ubuntu.dockerfile But I guess to me it would be way more useful if Dockerhub's free CI (Travis) hosting was used to automatically push out the streams for these builds for available for all to pull and use in docker, docker-compose, kubernetes. >
